scenario_text.value: Mind if I say something, Takuma?
Hmm? What?
Would you mind looking after my brother?

He looks like he’s ready to explode at any
second. I can tell by the look on his face.
Sure, okay. But why are you asking me?
I was thinking of watching him myself, but...

Well, he keeps looking at me. I don’t want
him to start getting suspicious.

(Why can’t they just get along as brother and
sister?)

(I don’t have any reason to turn her down
other than the bad timing, really.)
(How should I respond to Miu?)
Leave it to me!
Let’s both watch him.
This isn’t the time.
Leave it to me!

I don’t mind helping out. Can’t have Kaito
going off the deep end.
Thank you! I’ve been so worried.

If you’re worried about him, don’t you think
he’d be happier if you stayed close?

If I did that, I wouldn’t be able to complain
about how overprotective he is anymore...

(Is that what’s going on? The distance 
between them is hard to figure out.)
Let’s both watch him.

It bothers me too, but I can’t spend all of
my time just watching Kaito.
We should both keep an eye on him.
What, me too?
Is that a problem?

I was annoyed by how much he worries about
me, so I wouldn’t want to be a hypocrite.
Oh. So that’s what’s going on.

Yup!
Thanks for your help, Takuma!
(Wait. What? We reached an agreement?)
The timing is bad.

I really want to hear you out, but we don’t
have time for that right now.

We have to look for clues so we can find
Miyuki, Haru, Renamon, and Piedmon.

I know that, but I thought you could help out
just a little bit on the side!

(No matter what she says, I still won’t have
time for this...)

I just hope my brother doesn’t lose it.
I’m worried about him.

(Oh yeah, I wonder if the professor’s feeling
any better?)
(I should go <color=#B41919>check on him</color>.)
